question:
Which among the following are the proposals of the Cripps Mission?
1. India would be given a dominion status
2. A constitution assembly will be constituted
3. Any provinces could refrain themselves from joining the dominion of India
4. Indian Defence would remain in British hand till the Constitution is drafted
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Cripps Mission came to India in the year 1942 (23rd March). It gave the proposals on 29th March. As per the proposal, India would be given dominion status. A constitution assembly will be constituted to frame the constitution of India. Any provinces could refrain from joining the dominion of India. They would be responsible for making their own constitution. Indian defence would remain in the British hand till the Constitution is drafted.
